author: markekraus
body:
Replaces calls to httpbin.org/headers with WebListener Get.

reference #2504

(side note: I'm not sure what the point is of these vs the ones in #4798. I think a separate issue needs to be worked to streamline these tests as there appears to be many that perform the same exact checks against slightly different URLs without much difference in behavior or expected outcome).

comments.author: msftclas
comments.body:

title: Replace httpbin.org/headers with WebListener Get
